name: @axiom-crypto/core
description: SDK to build on top of Axiom, the ZK Coprocessor for Ethereum.
author: Intrinsic Technologies

scripts.build: ts-node scripts/preTsc.ts && rm -rf ./dist/* && tsc && ts-node scripts/postTsc.ts
scripts.build:staging: ts-node scripts/preTsc.ts && rm -rf ./dist/* && ENV=staging tsc && ts-node scripts/postTsc.ts
scripts.build:prod: ts-node scripts/preTsc.ts && rm -rf ./dist/* && ENV=prod tsc && ts-node scripts/postTsc.ts
